animeDescription: Piko-tarou will improvise the story of each three-minute episode using an illustration by the anime's director Takashi Taniguchi. He will tell each story in the style of a fairy tale and voice every character, including himself. (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Hosoya, Nobuyuki', 'Producer'], ['Taniguchi, Takashi', 'Director, Character Design'], ['Kosaka, Daimaou', 'Music, Planning'], ['Yamakawa, Norio', 'Associate Producer']]
